ygData.subject: Re:Experience and Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: ... They ... Valid point about whether or not Verant thinks that this is a problem.  I will ask why you don t think twinking is a problem or that anything
ygData.messageBody:
>____________________Reply Separator____________________
>
>Firstly:
>
>What makes you think "twinking" is a problem that verant wants to curtail.
They
>have never, not once made a post, comment editorial, patch or any other
>statement in any way about it. I am not convinced anything will ever be done
>about twinking or that it should.

Valid point about whether or not Verant thinks that this is a problem. I
will ask why you don't think twinking is a problem or that anything should
be done about it?
>
>Secondly:
>The coding required to implement such a system would probably require an
almost
>complete rewrite of the item or player character tables. This would take
ALOT
>of programmer time (requiring the cessation of all other projects) and would
>very likely introduce new BUGs and exploits.

I accept your argument on this conditionally, since my field of expertise
is emergency medicine and not computer programming. Couldn't they have
added this into the Ruins of Kunark expansion? Wouldn't an expansion of
that size have taken a great deal of programmer time?

Shando
